node.excerpt:
Documentation stored with source files shares the same permissions.
Documentation stored in a separate Git repository can use different
access controls. If Gerrit Code Review is being used, branch level
read permissions can be used to grant or restrict access to any
documentation branches. READMEs…

Given the discourse around this issue, it can be easy to either overestimate the scope of this problem, or discount solving it as irrelevant to the libraries’ mission. Recent studies have shown that the scale and impact of fake news is less significant than much of the initial reporting would…
